description: Setsuna goes to the town centre to meet Love according to fortune telling. Love is playing Lucky Draw in town when Setsuna meets her. She asked Love to give a tour of the town, on the way, she tries to steal Love`s Linkrun.

titles.title: Setsuna and Love: The Clover of Friendship!
Setsuna to Love: Yuujou no Clover!
せつなとラブ 友情のクローバー!
